movie.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movie.actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Harry Melling, Jason Boyd, Richard Macklin
movie.plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 14 wins & 38 nominations.
